[Groovy] Class ProcessController

java.lang.Object
  GrailsFlowSecureController
      ProcessController

class ProcessController
extends GrailsFlowSecureController

Process controller class is used for displaying process-related views. It is also contains logic for worklist representation.

Authors:
Stephan Albers
July Karpey
